data.question: What are the top-rated accommodations in Arugam Bay?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Arugam Bay"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
WHERE acc.Rating IS NOT NULL
RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, acc.Rating AS Rating
ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: Which areas are located in the Central Province?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Province {Province: "Central"})-[:HAS_DISTRICT]->(d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, d.District AS District;

data.question: What are the accommodations in Mirissa with a rating above 8?
What are the top 5 highest-rated accommodations in Nuwara Eliya?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Nuwara Eliya"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
WHERE acc.Rating IS NOT NULL
RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, acc.Rating AS Rating
ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: What are the accommodations near Gregory Lake in Nuwara Eliya?
What are the districts in the Southern Province?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Province {Province: "Southern"})-[:HAS_DISTRICT]->(d:District)
RETURN d.District AS District;

data.question: What are the accommodations in Hikkaduwa with a rating of 8 or higher?
What is the population of Colombo?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Colombo"})
RETURN a.Population AS Population;

data.question: What are the popular places to visit in Galle?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Galle"})-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place)
RETURN p.Place_To_Visit AS Place, p.Description AS Description;

data.question: What are the accommodations in Ella with a rating above 9?
What are the accommodations in Trincomalee with a rating above 8?
What are the top 5 highest-rated accommodations in Sri Lanka?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
WHERE acc.Rating IS NOT NULL AND acc.Rating <> "Not available" AND acc.Rating <> "No reviews yet"
RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, acc.Rating AS Rating
ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: What are the accommodations near Kandy ?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Kandy"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, acc.Nearby_Places AS Nearby_Places;

data.question: Retrieve all areas in a specific district along with their descriptions.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
RETURN d.District AS District, collect({Area: a.Areas, Description: a.Description}) AS AreasDetails;

data.question: Find the nearest police station for each area in a specific district.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
RETURN d.District AS District, a.Areas AS Area, p.Nearest_Police_Station AS NearestPoliceStation;

data.question: Retrieve accommodations in a specific area along with their ratings and types.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, collect({Accommodation: acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, Rating: acc.Rating, Type: acc.Type}) AS Accommodations;

data.question: Get all places to visit in areas with a population greater than 10,000.
Find restaurants in areas with Sunny weather at any time in the year.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_WEATHER]->(w:Weather)
WHERE w.Description = "Sunny"
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, collect(r.Restaurant) AS Restaurants;

data.question: Retrieve all provinces and their associated weather conditions.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Province)-[:HAS_DISTRICT]->(d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)-[:HAS_WEATHER]->(w:Weather)
RETURN p.Province AS Province, collect(distinct w.Description) AS WeatherConditions;

data.question: Get all districts and their ethnic compositions.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)
RETURN d.District AS District, {Sinhalese: d.Sinhalese, Tamils: d.Sri_Lankan_Tamils, Moors: d.Sri_Lankan_Moors, Others: d.Others} AS EthnicComposition;

data.question: Find all distances between areas in a specific district.
Retrieve all places to visit along with their activities and nearby accommodations.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Place)<-[:CONSISTED_WITH]-(a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
RETURN p.Place_To_Visit AS Place, p.Activity_Type AS Activity, collect(acc.Accommodation_Place_Name) AS NearbyAccommodations;

data.question: List all police stations in the area of Jaffna along with their contact numbers.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Jaffna"})-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
RETURN p.Nearest_Police_Station AS PoliceStation, p.Contact_Number AS ContactNumber;

data.question: Find all areas that have more than one police station.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
WITH a, COUNT(p) AS PoliceCount
WHERE PoliceCount > 1
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, PoliceCount;

data.question: Retrieve all police stations located in the district of Kandy.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District {District: "Kandy"})<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
RETURN p.Nearest_Police_Station AS PoliceStation, p.Contact_Number AS ContactNumber;

data.question: Which districts have the highest percentage of Sinhalese population?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)
RETURN d.District, d.Sinhalese
ORDER BY toFloat(d.Sinhalese) DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: What are the top 5 areas with the highest population?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)
RETURN a.Areas, a.Population
ORDER BY a.Population DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: Which places to visit are located in areas with a population of more than 100,000?
Find provinces with the most diverse emergency services network
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Province)-[:HAS_DISTRICT]->(d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
WITH p, 
     COUNT(DISTINCT h) as unique_hospitals,
     COUNT(DISTINCT p) as unique_police_stations,
     COUNT(DISTINCT a) as covered_areas
RETURN p.Province, 
       unique_hospitals,
       unique_police_stations,
       covered_areas,
       (unique_hospitals + unique_police_stations) * covered_areas as service_coverage_score
ORDER BY service_coverage_score DESC;

data.question: Find areas with matching hospital and police station contact numbers in same district
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
WHERE substring(toString(h.Contact_Number), 0, 3) = 
      substring(toString(p.Contact_Number), 0, 3)
RETURN d.District, a.Areas, h.Contact_Number AS HospitalNumber, p.Contact_Number AS PoliceNumber;

data.question: Find areas with emergency services in districts with high minority populations
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
WHERE toFloat(d.Sri_Lankan_Moors) > 10.0 OR toFloat(d.Indian_Tamils) > 10.0
RETURN d.District, 
       d.Sri_Lankan_Moors as moors_percentage,
       d.Indian_Tamils as indian_tamils_percentage,
       COLLECT(DISTINCT h.Nearest_Hospital) as hospitals,
       COLLECT(DISTINCT p.Nearest_Police_Station) as police_stations;

data.question: Find areas with teaching hospitals and their nearest base hospitals
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a1:Area)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h1:Hospital)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a2:Area)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h2:Hospital)
WHERE h1.Nearest_Hospital CONTAINS 'Teaching'
AND h2.Nearest_Hospital CONTAINS 'Base'
AND a1 <> a2
MATCH path = shortestPath((a1)-[:HAS_DISTANCE*]-(a2))
RETURN a1.Areas, h1.Nearest_Hospital,
       a2.Areas, h2.Nearest_Hospital,
       REDUCE(s = 0, r IN relationships(path) | s + r.Distance_in_km) as distance
ORDER BY distance;

data.question: Find the most common hospital types by province
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (p:Province)-[:HAS_DISTRICT]->(d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital)
WITH p, 
     CASE 
       WHEN h.Nearest_Hospital CONTAINS 'Teaching' THEN 'Teaching'
       WHEN h.Nearest_Hospital CONTAINS 'Base' THEN 'Base'
       WHEN h.Nearest_Hospital CONTAINS 'District' THEN 'District'
       ELSE 'Other'
     END as hospital_type,
     COUNT(*) as count
RETURN p.Province, hospital_type, count
ORDER BY p.Province, count DESC;

data.question: Find areas with hospitals whose contact numbers match their local area code
Find districts with highest Indian Tamil population and their emergency services.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital)
OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation)
RETURN d.District, d.Indian_Tamils,
       COLLECT(DISTINCT h.Nearest_Hospital) as hospitals,
       COLLECT(DISTINCT p.Nearest_Police_Station) as police_stations
ORDER BY toFloat(d.Indian_Tamils) DESC
LIMIT 5;

data.question: What are all the emergency contact numbers available in Sri Lanka and what services do they provide?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (c:Country {Country: 'Sri Lanka'})
RETURN 
    c.Suwa_Seriya_Ambulance as Ambulance,
    c.Police_Emergency_Service as Police,
    c.Children_Helpline as Children_Emergency,
    c.Women_Helpline as Women_Emergency,
    c.Trilingual_Health_Line as Health_Line;

data.question: List accommodations with ratings above 4.5 and their booking links.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Accomadation)
WHERE toFloat(a.Rating) > 4.5
RETURN a.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, a.Rating, a.Booking_Com_Booking_Link
ORDER BY a.Rating DESC;

data.question: What is the population of Arugam Bay, and in which district is it located?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Arugam Bay"})-[:LOCATED_IN]->(d:District)
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, a.Population AS Population, d.District AS District;

data.question: List all areas located in the Ampara district along with their descriptions.
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(d:District {District: "Ampara"})
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, a.Description AS Description;

data.question: Which areas have a population greater than 50,000, and what are their districts?
What are the top 5 places to visit in Kandy, and what type of activities can be done there?
What is the weather description for Nuwara Eliya, and what season is it associated with?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Nuwara Eliya"})-[:HAS_WEATHER]->(w:Weather)
RETURN a.Areas AS Area, w.Description AS Weather_Description, w.Season AS Season;

data.question: What are the top-rated accommodations in Arugam Bay, and what are their types?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Arugam Bay"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
WHERE acc.Rating IS NOT NULL
RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name AS Accommodation, acc.Rating AS Rating, acc.Type AS Type
ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC;

data.question: List all homestays in Kandy along with their descriptions and booking links.
What are the accommodations in Anuradhapura that offer an outdoor swimming pool?
Which accommodations in Kataragama are located near Yala National Park?
List all accommodations in Kandy that offer "mountain views" in their description.
What is the rating of the accommodation "Sound Sleep Resort" in Arugam Bay?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Arugam Bay"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation {Accommodation_Place_Name: "Sound Sleep Resort"})
RETURN acc.Rating AS Rating;

data.question: What type of accommodation is "The Clovelly Bungalow" in Nuwara Eliya?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Nuwara Eliya"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation {Accommodation_Place_Name: "The Clovelly Bungalow"})
RETURN acc.Type AS Type;

data.question: What is the booking link for the accommodation "Moon Garden Hotel and Restaurant"?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (acc:Accomadation {Accommodation_Place_Name: "Moon Garden Hotel and Restaurant"})
RETURN acc.Booking_Com_Booking_Link AS Booking_Link;

data.question: What is the average rating of accommodations in Anuradhapura?
data.cypher_query:
OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: "Anuradhapura"})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation)
RETURN AVG(toFloat(acc.Rating)) AS Average_Rating;

data.question: Which accommodations in Kataragama have a rating below 7?
Which accommodations in Arugam Bay have a description that mentions "beach"?
What are the descriptions of accommodations in Kandy that offer "spa services"?
Which accommodations in Anuradhapura have a booking link available?
What are the accommodations available in Arugam Bay along with their ratings and nearby places?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, acc.Type, acc.Description, acc.Nearby_Places, acc.Booking_Com_Booking_Link;

data.question: What is the distance between Arugam Bay and Nuwara Eliya?",
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a1:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[d:HAS_DISTANCE]->(a2:Area {Areas: 'Nuwara Eliya'}) RETURN a1.Areas AS Location1, a2.Areas AS Location2, d.Distance_in_km AS Distance;

data.question: What is the most spoken language in Colombo?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District {District: 'Colombo'}) RETURN d.Most_Used_Language;

data.question: What is the nearest hospital to Arugam Bay?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital) RETURN h.Nearest_Hospital, h.Contact_Number, h.Google_Map_Link;

data.question: What are the places to visit in Arugam Bay along with activity type and description?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) RETURN p.Place_To_Visit, p.Activity_Type, p.Description;

data.question: What is the nearest police station to Arugam Bay?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation) RETURN p.Nearest_Police_Station, p.Contact_Number, p.Google_Map_Link;

data.question: What are the restaurants in Arugam Bay along with their ratings?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant) RETURN r.Restaurant, r.Ratings, r.Google_map_link;

data.question: What are the emergency contact numbers of Sri Lanka?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (c:Country {Country: 'Sri Lanka'}) RETURN c.Suwa_Seriya_Ambulance AS Ambulance, c.Police_Emergency_Service AS Police, c.Government_Information_Center AS Info_Center, c.Bomb_Disposal_Unit AS Bomb_Disposal, c.National_Help_Desk AS Help_Desk, c.Sri_Lanka_Tourism_Development_Authority AS Tourism_Authority;

data.question: What is the weather like in Arugam Bay for January?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_WEATHER]->(w:Weather {Month: 'January'}) RETURN w.Season, w.Description;

data.question: What are the highest-rated accommodations in Arugam Bay (above 9.0 rating) along with nearby places?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) WHERE toFloat(acc.Rating) > 9.0 RETURN acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, acc.Nearby_Places ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC;

data.question: What are the top 3 restaurants in Arugam Bay based on ratings?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant) WITH r, SPLIT(r.Ratings, '(')[0] AS rating_value RETURN r.Restaurant, r.Ratings ORDER BY toFloat(rating_value) DESC LIMIT 3;

data.question: What is the nearest hospital and police station to Arugam Bay?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation) RETURN h.Nearest_Hospital, h.Contact_Number AS Hospital_Contact, p.Nearest_Police_Station, p.Contact_Number AS Police_Contact;

data.question: Find all locations within 200 km of Arugam Bay and sort them by distance.
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[d:HAS_DISTANCE]->(b:Area) WHERE toFloat(d.Distance_in_km) <= 200 RETURN b.Areas AS Nearby_Location, d.Distance_in_km ORDER BY toFloat(d.Distance_in_km) ASC;

data.question: Find all places in Arugam Bay where you can do outdoor activities.
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type = 'Outdoor' RETURN p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description;

data.question: Find the best area to visit based on the number of accommodations and tourist attractions.
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WITH a.Areas AS Area, COUNT(DISTINCT acc) AS Accom_Count, COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS Place_Count RETURN Area, Accom_Count, Place_Count, (Accom_Count + Place_Count) AS Score ORDER BY Score DESC LIMIT 1;

data.question: What is the shortest route (minimum distance) from Arugam Bay to Kandy, passing through at most one intermediate location?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (start:Area {Areas: 'Arugam Bay'})-[d1:HAS_DISTANCE]->(mid:Area)-[d2:HAS_DISTANCE]->(end:Area {Areas: 'Kandy'}) WITH start, mid, end, d1.Distance_in_km + d2.Distance_in_km AS Total_Distance ORDER BY Total_Distance ASC LIMIT 1 RETURN start.Areas AS Start, mid.Areas AS Stopover, end.Areas AS Destination, Total_Distance;

data.question: What are the top 5 most tourist-friendly areas, considering the number of accommodations, attractions, and restaurants?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant) WITH a.Areas AS Area, COUNT(DISTINCT acc) AS Accom_Count, COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS Place_Count, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS Restaurant_Count RETURN Area, Accom_Count, Place_Count, Restaurant_Count, (Accom_Count + Place_Count + Restaurant_Count) AS Score ORDER BY Score DESC LIMIT 5;

data.question: What is the safest area based on the number of police stations and hospitals nearby?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_HOSPITAL]->(h:Hospital) WITH a.Areas AS Area, COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS Police_Count, COUNT(DISTINCT h) AS Hospital_Count RETURN Area, Police_Count, Hospital_Count, (Police_Count + Hospital_Count) AS Safety_Score ORDER BY Safety_Score DESC LIMIT 1;

data.question: Find the best city for a road trip based on central accessibility (most direct routes to other areas).
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[d:HAS_DISTANCE]->(other:Area) WITH a.Areas AS Area, COUNT(d) AS Road_Connections ORDER BY Road_Connections DESC LIMIT 1 RETURN Area, Road_Connections;

data.question: What are the top 5 historical places in Sri Lanka with cultural significance?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Historical' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'UNESCO' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'heritage' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit ASC LIMIT 5;

data.question: Which historical sites are located within 50 km of Kandy?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area {Areas: 'Kandy'})-[d:HAS_DISTANCE]->(nearby:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE d.Distance_in_km <= 50 AND (p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Historical' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'heritage') RETURN nearby.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, d.Distance_in_km ORDER BY d.Distance_in_km ASC;

data.question: Which areas have the cheapest accommodations (but still rated above 8.0)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) WHERE toFloat(acc.Rating) > 8.0 RETURN a.Areas, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, acc.Description ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC LIMIT 5;

data.question: Which areas have budget-friendly accommodations and nearby public transport access?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_POLICE]->(p:PoliceStation) WHERE toFloat(acc.Rating) > 8.0 RETURN a.Areas, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, p.Nearest_Police_Station ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC;

data.question: What are the most affordable destinations to visit in Sri Lanka based on the number of free outdoor activities?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Outdoor' AND (p.Description CONTAINS 'hiking' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'beach' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'safari' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'nature') RETURN a.Areas, COUNT(p) AS Free_Activities ORDER BY Free_Activities DESC LIMIT 5;

data.question: Which locations have high-rated restaurants but are not popular tourist destinations?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE toFloat(r.Ratings) > 4.5 AND p IS NULL RETURN a.Areas, r.Restaurant, r.Ratings ORDER BY r.Ratings DESC;

data.question: Where can I find unique outdoor activities that are not commonly visited?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Outdoor' AND (p.Description CONTAINS 'hidden' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'secluded' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'undiscovered') RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit ASC;

data.question: Which small towns or villages have high-rated accommodations but are not well-known tourist hubs?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE toFloat(acc.Rating) > 9.0 AND p IS NULL RETURN a.Areas, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC LIMIT 5;

data.question: What are the best historical sites to visit in Sri Lanka?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Historical' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'ancient' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'heritage' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'UNESCO' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;

data.question: What are the hidden gems (less popular but highly rated attractions) in Sri Lanka?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'secluded' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'hidden' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'off the beaten path' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'less crowded' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;

data.question: What are the best areas for experiencing authentic Sri Lankan culture (based on places mentioning 'cultural' or 'traditional')?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'cultural' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'traditional' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'heritage' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'festival' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;

data.question: What are the best destinations for adventure tourism in Sri Lanka (hiking, surfing, safaris)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Activity_Type CONTAINS 'Outdoor' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'hiking' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'surfing' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'safari' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'rafting' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Activity_Type, p.Description ORDER BY p.Activity_Type;

data.question: Which district has the highest number of places to visit?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (d:District)<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WITH d.District AS District, COUNT(p) AS Place_Count ORDER BY Place_Count DESC LIMIT 1 RETURN District, Place_Count;

data.question: What are the best areas for wildlife enthusiasts (safaris and national parks)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'wildlife' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'safari' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'national park' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;

data.question: Which areas have both top-rated restaurants and accommodations (best food and stay)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_RESTAURANT]->(r:Restaurant) WHERE toFloat(acc.Rating) > 9.0 AND toFloat(r.Ratings) > 4.5 RETURN a.Areas, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, r.Restaurant, r.Ratings, r.Google_map_link ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC, r.Ratings DESC;

data.question: Which areas are best for a romantic getaway (luxury accommodations, scenic spots)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:HAS_ACCOMADATION]->(acc:Accomadation) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE acc.Type CONTAINS 'Resort' AND toFloat(acc.Rating) > 9.2 AND (p.Description CONTAINS 'romantic' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'scenic' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'sunset') RETURN a.Areas, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC;

data.question: What are the most photogenic locations in Sri Lanka (places mentioned with 'scenic', 'viewpoint', or 'sunset')?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'scenic' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'viewpoint' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'sunset' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'picturesque' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;

data.question: What is the best area for tea lovers, based on tea plantations and accommodations near them?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) OPTIONAL MATCH (a)-[:HAS_ACCOMODATION]->(acc:Accomadation) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'tea plantation' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'tea factory' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, acc.Accommodation_Place_Name, acc.Rating ORDER BY acc.Rating DESC;

data.question: Which area has the highest number of seasonal tourist activities?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (w:Weather)-[:HAS_WEATHER]-(a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE w.Description CONTAINS 'best time' OR w.Description CONTAINS 'ideal' WITH a.Areas AS Area, COUNT(p) AS Seasonal_Activities ORDER BY Seasonal_Activities DESC LIMIT 1 RETURN Area, Seasonal_Activities;

data.question: Which areas have the least number of tourists but offer great attractions (hidden paradise)?
data.cypher_query: OPTIONAL MATCH (a:Area)-[:CONSISTED_WITH]->(p:Place) WHERE p.Description CONTAINS 'underrated' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'quiet' OR p.Description CONTAINS 'hidden' RETURN a.Areas, p.Place_To_Visit, p.Description ORDER BY p.Place_To_Visit;
